name: Kerberoasting Detection - TGS Requests with RC4 Encryption
description:
MITRE ATT&CK: T1558.003 - Steal or Forge Kerberos Tickets: Kerberoasting

#event_simpleName = "UserLogon" OR #event_simpleName = "KerberosTicketGrantingService"
| EventType = "4769"
| TicketEncryptionType = "0x17"  // RC4-HMAC (weak encryption, commonly abused)
| ServiceName != "krbtgt"
| ServiceName != /\$$/  // Exclude machine accounts
| groupBy([SourceIP, TargetUserName], function=count(), span=5m)
| _count > 10
| rename(SourceIP, as="AttackerIP")
| rename(TargetUserName, as="TargetAccount")

search.filter:
| EventType = "4769"
| TicketEncryptionType = "0x17"  // RC4-HMAC (weak encryption, commonly abused)
| ServiceName != "krbtgt"
| ServiceName != /\$$/  // Exclude machine accounts
| groupBy([SourceIP, TargetUserName], function=count())
| _count > 10
| rename(SourceIP, as="AttackerIP")
| rename(TargetUserName, as="TargetAccount")

name: AS-REP Roasting Detection - TGT Requests Without Pre-Authentication
description:
MITRE ATT&CK: T1558.004 - Steal or Forge Kerberos Tickets: AS-REP Roasting

#event_simpleName = "UserLogon" OR #event_simpleName = "KerberosAuthenticationService"
| EventType = "4768"
| PreAuthType = "0x0"  // No pre-authentication (vulnerable accounts)
| Status = "0x0"  // Success
| TargetUserName != /\$$/  // Exclude machine accounts
| TargetUserName != "krbtgt"
| groupBy([SourceIP, TargetUserName], function=count(), span=5m)
| _count > 5
| rename(SourceIP, as="AttackerIP")
| rename(TargetUserName, as="VulnerableAccount")

search.filter:
| EventType = "4768"
| PreAuthType = "0x0"  // No pre-authentication (vulnerable accounts)
| Status = "0x0"  // Success
| TargetUserName != /\$$/  // Exclude machine accounts
| TargetUserName != "krbtgt"
| groupBy([SourceIP, TargetUserName], function=count())
| _count > 5
| rename(SourceIP, as="AttackerIP")
| rename(TargetUserName, as="VulnerableAccount")
